title: Bella Thorne and new girlfriend Alex Martini hold hands as they head out of Toronto airport
text:
She declared her new relationship status on Instagram Sunday afternoon with a sultry topless photo.

And Bella Thorne seemed to be in great spirits as she headed off on another adventure out of the Toronto International Airport holding hands with Alex Martini.

The 21-year-old actress donned a cozy black sweatsuit as she walked hand-in-hand through the terminal with her set production assistant girlfriend.

Love is in the air: Bella Thorne seemed to be in great spirits as she headed off on another adventure out of the Toronto International Airport holding hands with Alex Martini

Bella kept her famous figure under wraps wearing an over-sized back sweatshirt with matching track pants.

She stepped out into the airport in fuzzy black slides and socks, and walked her pet pooch Tampon on a pink leash.

The Her and Him director hid her auburn hair underneath a grey beanie with the Canadian flag plastered across the front and appeared to be makeup-free.

Alex walked by her new lady love wearing a grey ensemble complete with skinny jeans, a zipped-up hoodie and the bright yellow Converse trainers featured in Bella's latest saucy snaps.

Shortly after her airport stint, the Shake It Up star stripped down to a white bra and matching shorts for a series of social media snaps.
